thread.title: Six More Books to Read This Winter

author: Ellen Gamerman
title: Six More Books to Read This Winter
text:
Just because we made the experts pick only one book doesn’t mean we had to. In compiling The Wall Street Journal’s winter book recommendations from publishing pros—each asked to recommend a single work—we came across other intriguing novels along the way. Authors range from acclaimed veterans to splashy newcomers. A sprinkling of former journalists are also grabbing attention (Journal staffers who compiled this list have worked alongside a couple of them back when the authors were journalists). Our reading list just keeps growing. Here, a sampling:
